description: Rules to decode the isometric perspective using the visual axes drawn in the reference image.

visual_direction_UP.reasoning: Due to perspective, points further away appear higher in the image.

visual_direction_DOWN.reasoning: Points closer to the camera appear lower.

center_reference_logic: To determine an object's slot, draw an imaginary line from the object to the CENTER. If the line goes UP-LEFT relative to the Red/Blue crosshair, the object is in Back-Left.
